Articles.Content:
Mods: MJ, DOE, StageRecovery

![8ff70840209608eaba3a72f0bf345380.png](http://i.gyazo.com/8ff70840209608eaba3a72f0bf345380.png)

The entire Mun has a stripe terrain (yes I checked everywhere)

Is this usual?
I've seen some of that before, it's particularily pronounced at the poles and the striated terrain appears elsehwere sometimes.

Yes, it's normal. Unfortunately. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

All textures got stretched in the new update, whether accidentally or on purpose is unknown to me.
